tldr: Affected versions are vulnerable to authorization bypass due to incorrect resolution of security annotations on methods within type hierarchies that use parameterized supertypes with unbounded generics, impacting features like `@PreAuthorize` and other method-level security annotations.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if your application uses a vulnerable version in combination with `@EnableMethodSecurity` and applies security annotations on methods defined in generic superclasses or generic interfaces. Applications that do not use `@EnableMethodSecurity` or do not rely on such annotations are not impacted.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `org.springframework.security:spring-security-web` library to a patch version.
